org.magnos.asset.source
Class DatabaseSource

java.lang.Object
  org.magnos.asset.base.BaseAssetSource
      org.magnos.asset.source.DatabaseSource
All Implemented Interfaces:
AssetSource
public class DatabaseSource
extends BaseAssetSource

A source that reads assets from a database connection.

Author:
Philip Diffenderfer

Constant Field Values
Constructor Detail

DatabaseSource

public DatabaseSource(Connection connection,
                      String query)
Instantiates a new DatabaseSource that uses the given connection.

Parameters:
connection - The Connection to use to query the database for the assets.
query - The query used to select the asset from the database.

DatabaseSource

public DatabaseSource(Connection connection,
                      String tableName,
                      String assetColumn,
                      String requestColumn)
Instantiates a new DatabaseSource that uses the given connection.

Parameters:
connection - The Connection to use to query the database for the assets.
tableName - The name of the table containing the assets.
assetColumn - The name of the column containing the asset.
requestColumn - The name of the column that contains the requests.

DatabaseSource

public DatabaseSource(DataSource dataSource,
                      String query)
Instantiates a new DatabaseSource that uses the given DataSource to create database connections.

Parameters:
dataSource - The DataSource to create connections with.
query - The query used to select the asset from the database.
Method Detail

getQuery

public String getQuery()
The query used to select the asset from the database. The first column returned from this query must be a BLOB or CLOB in which case the value will be read as a binary stream of data.

Returns:
The reference to the query String.

getConnection

public Connection getConnection()
The Connection used to query the database for assets. If this is null then a DataSource was given to this source.

Returns:
The reference to the given Connection or null.

getDataSource

public DataSource getDataSource()
The DataSource used to create connections to the database. If this is null then a Connection was given to this source.

Returns:
The reference to the given DataSource or null.

getStream

public InputStream getStream(String request)
                      throws Exception
Description copied from interface: AssetSource
Returns an InputStream to the requested asset. If the asset doesn't exist in this source then an exception will be thrown or null will be returned depending on the implementation.

Parameters:
request - The request for the asset.
Returns:
The reference to InputStream containing the requested asset, or null if the request was invalid.
Throws:
Exception - An error occurred retrieving the asset from the source.
